Disabling two-factor authentication will: Disabling two-factor authentication will make your account less secure. You'll only need your password to sign in.
Please enter your password to disable tw: Please enter your password to disable two-factor authentication:
Protect your account with an additional: Protect your account with an additional verification layer when signing in.
Two-factor authentication is active on y: Two-factor authentication is active on your account.
New backup codes have been generated: New backup codes have been generated
Backup codes can be used to access your: Backup codes can be used to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app. Each code can only be used once.
You can regenerate new backup codes at a: You can regenerate new backup codes at any time. This will invalidate all existing codes.
Make sure to save these codes in a secur: Make sure to save these codes in a secure place. Your old backup codes are no longer valid.
1. Scan this QR code with your authentic: 1. Scan this QR code with your authenticator app

Your workspace requires two-factor authe: Your workspace requires two-factor authentication for all users
To continue accessing your workspace, yo: To continue accessing your workspace, you must set up two-factor authentication. This adds an extra layer of security to your account.
Your workspace requires two-factor authe: Your workspace requires two-factor authentication. Please set it up to continue.
This adds an extra layer of security to: This adds an extra layer of security to your account by requiring a verification code from your authenticator app.
Password must be at least 8 characters: Password must be at least 8 characters
Enter the 6-digit code found in your aut: Enter the 6-digit code found in your authenticator app

Password reset successful. Please log in with your new password to set up two-factor authentication.

Enter one of your backup codes: Enter one of your backup codes
Enter one of your backup codes. Each bac: Enter one of your backup codes. Each backup code can only be used once.
